alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Leon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 02 at 6:15PM CDT until April 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Freestone County in central Texas... Northern Leon County in central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles west of Buffalo, or 11 miles southeast of Teague, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. A rotating funnel cloud was spotted northwest of Buffalo at 6:09 PM. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Buffalo around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lanely, Dew, Flo, Oakwood, Corinth, Donie, Freestone, Red Lake and Jewett. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 173 and 190. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
